description:
Works to trees in frontage and pavement areas. 

 Works:  Self Sown Sycamores on site:-  Fell. 

         On pavement: 

         Large Plane:    Crown lift 6m., over road and                         adjacent to development site,         Two Maples:     carefully remove horizontal                         laterals growing across site to                         facilitate erection of building.                         Leaving upright leaders where                         possible, balance crown on opposite                         side without doing an overall                         reduction.
decision_conditions: Contact the Council's Tree Officer to arrange for him to be present on day of works.
